extendedInfo.description: http://makemyandroidapp.commakemyandroidapp@gmail.comThis is the second step of what I plan to implement(Hint: These plans come from the comments, if you have idea's for what you'd like this app to do or how you'd like to interact with it, please do share =)This app is an alarm clock with a catch. The only way to turn it off is to scan a specific QR Code. You can print the QR code and put it up somewhere in your house that is not next to your bed(Bathroom, Kitchen?). This way when your alarm goes off you will have to get out of bed to turn it off.Perfect if you abuse the snooze button.You can download the QR you need from this website:http://db.tt/8PHTKGcYou must have 'Barcode Scanner' installed to use this application.Props to Havchr, he had this idea originally. I've just made it slightly more user friendly. http://www.havchr.net/Email me if you'd like to see any additional features.@mattanja there should be an "Email Developer" button in your market somewhere. If not I can be reacehd at:MakeMyAndroidApp@gmail.com

reviews.title: Droid RAZR Maxx - Works Great
reviews.comment: Application is perfect. I just made the qr code a bigger and made it the default lock screen on my ipad across the room. My only criticism would be to have a nicer UI and maybe more customizable settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to improve
reviews.comment: Can easily turn off by force close.
reviews.author: om asv

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: Scanner works alone but not with alarm
reviews.author: Bismarck Hesse

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work! galaxy sII can even set the alarm freezes my whole phone as soon as I open it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great premise, poor execution
reviews.comment: Keeps lowering the media volume making the alarm quiet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice, but...
reviews.comment: nice concept, simple UI, but keeps force closing on my sensation.. also, I can\'t delete an alarm?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Finally! I have 3 alarm clocks that I just hit snooze. Now I have to get up and go in the kitchen to turn it off! Can\'t wait for future updates and more features!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow.. tnx . Now i wont lose my job.. although its a little bit hard to wake up wit this bad sounds but finally it make u jump down of bed..lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Beta - would LOVE to see more.
reviews.comment: QR = Best Ever feature for alarms.  I\'m surprised that among allllll the alarm clock apps out there, not too many support QR.  Those that do tend to be bulky and overkill for my use.  Early Bird is hideous IMO.  Sleep-as-an-droid does it but that\'s obviously secondary.  And so on.  This app on the other hand, is QR at it\'s core.  As others have said, custom audio, standard interface, and a default volume level would be great.   This and multiple alarms would make this a six-star app IMO and all other alarms would be moot for my needs.  Either multiples or custom audio would make it a 5 star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice alarm app... Could use a few things
reviews.comment: The theory behind this alarm app is excellent. It works wonders for making you get your butt out of bed! My only complaint is lack of standard android alarm interface. I have used other alarm clocks from the market and they all have a standard interface similar to the built in alarm. Changing this and adding more sounds (i.e. the native Android alarm sounds) would raise this to a 5 star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Req. custom alarm tones & if possible block volume controls when alarm clock ringing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I agree with @Kurt. Need to be able to set your own alarm sounds! Please change this asap!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Yea, I shure won\'t oversleep the alarm anymore! Thanks for that. But it should not set the volume to the max and should allow you to set the sound with Rings Extended or something. (Also you state you\'re willing to share the source, but how can I contact you?)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Is this real? Wow. Dumbest thing I ever seen next to slap chop.
reviews.author: A Google User
